A.PCBP_UPDT_DATE > B.PCBP_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBPCBP B ON B.PCBP_CORP_CODE = A.PCBP_CORP_CODE AND B.PCBP_STND_GUBN = A.PCBP_STND_GUBN AND B.PCBP_STND_DEGR = A.PCBP_STND_DEGR AND B.PCBP_PROC_SEQ0 = A.PCBP_PROC_SEQ0

UPDATE CATBPCBP SET PCBP_PROC_GUBN = #pcbp_proc_gubn# ,PCBP_KIND_CODE = #pcbp_kind_code# ,PCBP_JUMP_YN = #pcbp_jump_yn# ,PCBP_TOPP_GROP = #pcbp_topp_grop# ,PCBP_BOTT_GROP = #pcbp_bott_grop# ,PCBP_PROC_NAME = #pcbp_proc_name# ,PCBP_NET0_CYTM = #pcbp_net0_cytm# ,PCBP_NET0_COEF1 = #pcbp_net0_coef1# ,PCBP_NET0_COEF2 = #pcbp_net0_coef2# ,PCBP_NET0_COEF3 = #pcbp_net0_coef3# ,PCBP_CAVT = #pcbp_cavt# ,PCBP_PREP_HOUR = #pcbp_prep_hour# ,PCBP_PRSN_CNT0 = #pcbp_prsn_cnt0# ,PCBP_MCHH_CODE = #pcbp_mchh_code# ,PCBP_APPL_GUBN = #pcbp_appl_gubn# ,PCBP_REMK = #pcbp_remk# ,PCBP_UPDT_CMAN = #pcbp_updt_cman# ,PCBP_UPDT_DATE = #pcbp_updt_date# WHERE PCBP_CORP_CODE = #pcbp_corp_code# AND PCBP_STND_GUBN = #pcbp_stnd_gubn# AND PCBP_STND_DEGR = #pcbp_stnd_degr# AND PCBP_PROC_SEQ0 = #pcbp_proc_seq0#
